author: Staff Reporter
text:
A total of 17,322 forms were received from the public during the special camp for electoral roll organised at 1096 locations in Madurai district on Sunday. R.K. Srivastava, principal secretary from Election Commission of India, who was on a visit to Madurai, inspected the special camp at Al-Ameen Higher Secondary School here.

Officials said that out of the 17,322 forms, around 14,300 were for addition to the electoral roll while the remaining forms were for deletions and corrections. Forms were also received at the facilitation centre at Election Tahsildar’s office on Madurai Collectorate premises.

Officials said that another special camp would be arranged at the same locations on February 6.
title: Poll roll special camp held
